articles.title: Bikram Singh Bedi, the man who set up AWS in India, has now joined Google Cloud - Business Insider India
articles.description: Google Cloud has appointed Bikram Singh Bedi as its new India Managing Director. Bedi’s appointment comes as Google Cloud had recently elevated its India head
articles.content:
Google Cloud has appointed Bikram Singh Bedi as its new India Managing Director. Interestingly, Bedi was the man who set up Amazon Web Services in India and led the vertical for six years long.
